p: Double-stranded oligonucleotides corresponding to the target sequences were cloned into the pSuper.Retro-RNAi plasmid (Oligoengine). The following sequences were targeted for UL42 mRNA: #1 5’-GCTGGTGGACCTCAACAACTT-3’; #2 5’-GCCAATGGATCATGCTGTTTC-3’; The following sequences were targeted for UL82: 5’-GCTGGTGGACCTCAACAACTT-3’; The following sequences were targeted for UL31: 5’-GGACAACTTTCTCACGTCT-3’; The sequence targeted by the control RNAi plasmid is: 5’-GGAAGATGTATGGAGACATGG-3’.
